# autotracer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of autotracer is to facilitate identification of connected cases (transmission chains), using Electronic Medical Record data.

## Installation

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("conedatascience/autotracer")
```
